title: test_scalar_fusion is flaky
body_html:
Sample log: https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-linux-trusty-py2.7.9-test/16930//console

02:04:52 ======================================================================
02:04:52 FAIL: test_scalar_fusion (__main__.TestScript)
02:04:52 ----------------------------------------------------------------------
02:04:52 Traceback (most recent call last):
02:04:52   File "test_jit.py", line 3048, in test_scalar_fusion
02:04:52     self.assertExpectedGraph(ge.graph_for(x, y))
02:04:52   File "test_jit.py", line 248, in assertExpectedGraph
02:04:52     self.assertExpected(str(graph), *args, **kwargs)
02:04:52   File "/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/test/common.py", line 524, in assertExpected
02:04:52     self.assertMultiLineEqual(expected, s)
02:04:52 AssertionError: 'graph(%x : Float()\n      %y : Float()) {\n  %2 : Float() = prim::FusionGroup_0 [truncated]... != 'graph(%x : Float()\n      %y : Float()) {\n  %2 : Float() = aten::type_as(%y, % [truncated]...
02:04:52   graph(%x : Float()
02:04:52         %y : Float()) {
02:04:52 -   %2 : Float() = prim::FusionGroup_0[device=-1](%x, %y)
02:04:52 -   return (%2);
02:04:52 - }
02:04:52 - with prim::FusionGroup_0 = graph(%0 : Float()
02:04:52 -       %1 : Float()) {
02:04:52 -   %2 : Float() = aten::type_as(%1, %0)
02:04:52 ?                                 ^   ^
02:04:52 +   %2 : Float() = aten::type_as(%y, %x)
02:04:52 ?                                 ^   ^
02:04:52     %3 : int = prim::Constant[value=1]()
02:04:52 -   %4 : Float() = aten::add(%0, %2, %3)
02:04:52 ?                             ^
02:04:52 +   %4 : Float() = aten::add(%x, %2, %3)
02:04:52 ?                             ^
02:04:52     return (%4);
02:04:52   }
02:04:52 
02:04:52

body:
Sample log: https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-linux-trusty-py2.7.9-test/16930//console

```
02:04:52 ======================================================================
02:04:52 FAIL: test_scalar_fusion (__main__.TestScript)
02:04:52 ----------------------------------------------------------------------
02:04:52 Traceback (most recent call last):
02:04:52   File "test_jit.py", line 3048, in test_scalar_fusion
02:04:52     self.assertExpectedGraph(ge.graph_for(x, y))
02:04:52   File "test_jit.py", line 248, in assertExpectedGraph
02:04:52     self.assertExpected(str(graph), *args, **kwargs)
02:04:52   File "/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/test/common.py", line 524, in assertExpected
02:04:52     self.assertMultiLineEqual(expected, s)
02:04:52 AssertionError: 'graph(%x : Float()\n      %y : Float()) {\n  %2 : Float() = prim::FusionGroup_0 [truncated]... != 'graph(%x : Float()\n      %y : Float()) {\n  %2 : Float() = aten::type_as(%y, % [truncated]...
02:04:52   graph(%x : Float()
02:04:52         %y : Float()) {
02:04:52 -   %2 : Float() = prim::FusionGroup_0[device=-1](%x, %y)
02:04:52 -   return (%2);
02:04:52 - }
02:04:52 - with prim::FusionGroup_0 = graph(%0 : Float()
02:04:52 -       %1 : Float()) {
02:04:52 -   %2 : Float() = aten::type_as(%1, %0)
02:04:52 ?                                 ^   ^
02:04:52 +   %2 : Float() = aten::type_as(%y, %x)
02:04:52 ?                                 ^   ^
02:04:52     %3 : int = prim::Constant[value=1]()
02:04:52 -   %4 : Float() = aten::add(%0, %2, %3)
02:04:52 ?                             ^
02:04:52 +   %4 : Float() = aten::add(%x, %2, %3)
02:04:52 ?                             ^
02:04:52     return (%4);
02:04:52   }
02:04:52 
02:04:52 
```
